settings.title: Customer Service
settings.text:
For FAQ and customer service, please contact support@yeelight.com
Mon-Fri 9AM-5PM (UTC+8)
We'll reply within 48 hours in the working days.

settings.title: Media and Press Contact
settings.text: For any media and press activities, interviews, or product introductions, please mail pr@yeelight.com

settings.title: Influencer Contact
settings.text: For social media KOLs and influencers who love Yeelight products, please mail influencer@yeelight.com

settings.title: Affiliate Contact
settings.text: The Yeelight Affiliate Program offers competitive commissions of 8% with a cookie length of 45 days. Please mail AFF@yeelight.com
